name: Hamster Wizard ESCAPE!
description:
Hamster Wizard Escape a laboratory by swapping in and out of your hamster ball.

Expected playtime: ~15 minutes.

Great players can go for the fastest time!

This is my first public solo project. I made it short so everyone can reasonably beat it, but I added a timer so pros can go for fast times!

DONATIONS ARE APPRECIATED BUT OPTIONAL!!
